mapper.select: select c.ct_no,c.ct_prd_quantity,c.ct_prd_op_price,c.ct_prd_op_name,c.m_no,c.type,c.prd_no,p.prd_selling_price, p.prd_name,p.prd_main_img,p.prd_stock,od.pod_stock from cart c join product p on c.prd_no = p.prd_no left join option_detail od on c.pod_no = od.pod_no where m_no=#{mno}
select count(ct_no) as cnt from cart where m_no=#{mno}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where ct_no = #{ctNo} and m_no = #{no}
